Megatron Revived:
 
"Perhaps," he said thoughtfully.  "But Vector Sigma created my spark with everything the original had, all of his memory up to 2005.  So am a simple clone, or something more?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord::


"However"said the male"You have a second chance, and that no happen 
all days"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller decided that this was a good place to
> throw in a bit of mystical slag to keep up
> appearances, "all living sparks flow from the matrix.

> them come again."
